pages.meta_description_1: (Togo, Africa) — NAN Youth Huddle Representative and Morehouse freshman Follyvi Dossa traveled back home in Togo Africa, and is teaching young students about the movement for black lives here in America. Watch the clip below. to hear the students chanting “No Justice, No Peace”.
